Jx.Formatter.Phone

Extends: Jx.Formatter

Formats data as phone numbers.  Currently only US-style phone numbers are supported.

Example

Summary
Jx.Formatter.PhoneExtends: Jx.Formatter
Options
useParensWhether to use parenthesis () around the area code. 
separatorThe character to use as a separator in the phone number. 
Functions
formatFormat the input as a phone number. 



Options



useParens
Whether to use parenthesis () around the area code.  Defaults to true



separator
The character to use as a separator in the phone number.  Defaults to a dash ‘-’.



Functions



format
format : function (value)
Format the input as a phone number.  This will strip all non-numeric characters and apply the current default formatting
Parameters
valuethe text to format









Extends: Jx.Object
format : function (value)
Format the input as a phone number.
